mapper.select: select c.cal_no , c.cal_title , c.cal_place , c.cal_content , c.cal_start_date , c.cal_end_date , c.cal_time , c.cal_color , c.cal_range , c.cal_status , mem_no , e.mem_name , d.dept_name , j.job_name from calendar c join employee e using(mem_no) join department d using(dept_code) join jobgrade j using(job_code) where c.cal_status = 'Y' and c.cal_range = '개인' and mem_no = #{memNo}

select c.cal_no , c.cal_title , c.cal_place , c.cal_content , c.cal_start_date , c.cal_end_date , c.cal_time , c.cal_color , c.cal_range , c.cal_status , mem_no , e.mem_name , d.dept_name , j.job_name from calendar c join employee e using(mem_no) join department d using(dept_code) join jobgrade j using(job_code) where c.cal_status = 'Y' and c.cal_range = '부서' and d.dept_name = #{deptName}

select c.cal_no , c.cal_title , c.cal_place , c.cal_content , c.cal_start_date , c.cal_end_date , c.cal_time , c.cal_color , c.cal_range , c.cal_status , mem_no , e.mem_name , d.dept_name , j.job_name from calendar c join employee e using(mem_no) join department d using(dept_code) join jobgrade j using(job_code) where c.cal_status = 'Y' and c.cal_range = '사내'
